How to lose 45 kg without diet and exercise

This method will help you lose up to 15 kg per week quickly and safely

Welcome everyone! Alaa El-Sherbiny is with you as usual. I managed to lose weight using an almost unknown method and this post could be deleted soon. This new method represents a real breakthrough in nutrition. Many dietitians are desperately trying to hide this method as revealing it will seriously harm their interests. I spent a lot of time and money torturing myself with diet and exercising with my personal fitness coaches, but nothing worked for me. I found another solution that was so simple and accessible to everyone that it was hard to believe. Now I want to share this secret with everyone who has problems with overweight and health.

Here is my story:

I always liked eating hearty meals, so I was huge since my early childhood. What I liked most was eating fast food while sitting in front of the TV after work. Although my wife did not look like me, she did not seriously protest this. But when I was 25, my body size started to increase rapidly, especially the abdomen. I haven't even noticed how incredibly large I am. I looked like a pig with a huge debt. When I was 33, I weighed 125 kilograms, or 46 kilograms, above my normal height

Besides, I had serious health problems in the pancreas. I began to suffer from fatigue, excessive sweating, and shortness of breath, but the worst thing was impotence. To be honest, my huge belly has deprived me of my manhood for a long time. But when I finally stopped practicing, I realized that it was difficult. Impotence affected my family life. My wife started quarreling often. Not being able to please my wife was a big blow to my self-confidence, I hated myself and felt like a failure.

I had a medical examination in the hospital and the results were very sad, my body was at risk of developing diabetes. Many years of eating fast food destroyed my body, especially the pancreas.

I followed a strict diet. When you eat everything you want throughout your life, a diet can become a true psychological torture. Every week I was standing on the scale hoping that my torture was not in vain, but my budget was always showing 125.9 kg. After 3 months I decided to boost my exercise regimen and started going to the gym. A local coach told me that I will start to lose weight in only six months and given that I am heavy, intensive workouts are very dangerous for me. So, I was just doing simple exercises like walking on a treadmill, riding an exercise bike, squat and jumping. But even doing 10 simple squats was hard on me, I was gasping and feeling dizzy. The other people in the gym were smiling when looking at me. I agree with them, isn't it funny to see a goofy with a huge debt panting and sweaty when doing exercises any retiree can do easily.

It was the most difficult moment of my entire life, I was constantly hungry, even in my dreams I was seeing food. She became very nervous and angry. I would have felt better if I had some support from my wife but she hated me, we were quarreling all the time and insulted me with terrible words, such as calling me "petty fat", "failed" and saying "you have never satisfied my desires". It was a disaster. My wife did not support me and soon left me for the sake of another man and asked for a divorce.

After that, I tried to stick to my diet and do exercises in the gym for another month, but when I showed my balance again 125 kg I left the diet. I went back to junk food and swallowed it with spirits at the same time.

Until the time came when I felt that I did not want to live, if not for my friend Ramiz I would have killed myself. She saved me, and I moved home to overcome depression. I told Ramez everything I was hiding inside me, and I was ashamed of being an adult crying and sobbing as a little girl. Listen to me carefully and say: "Why didn't you tell me this before? There is a much simpler way to lose weight which is fast and safe. Here is a solution to all your problems. I have used it for a long time and it is really effective." After saying this he gave me a package labeled Green Coffee. He told me that it is a natural product for losing weight and improving metabolism.

It was hard to believe, but then I got it! Ramiz always ate a lot of fast food and other unhealthy things but he was graceful and healthy. I started searching online to try to find information on Green Coffee and started taking it according to the usage guidelines. I used to drink it twice a day 30 minutes before meals.

My results:

After a week of using Green Coffee, my weight was healthy and I started to feel better. She became lively and energetic. And after 14 days I was really shocked. My weight fell about 9.3 kg despite the fact that I ate everything I wanted! Simply losing weight without restrictions! It was amazing!

After another 7 days I was able to lose an additional 8.5 kg! The fats were melting fast and easy for two and a half months.

Every new day I was feeling a wave of energy and my side was no longer hurting, and I got rid of impotence. After my body got rid of toxins my erection became stronger and more lasting (average intercourse duration is 40-60 minutes). Besides, she became attractive in the eyes of the opposite sex. Women started to like me. It was amazing! Suddenly, my ex-wife reappeared and tried to get back to me. She couldn't get much but I didn't care at all.

Now I want to briefly describe how it works - 100% natural extract of green coffee and chlorogenic acid. These ingredients do everything to get a healthy and fit body.

It reduces the carbohydrates that the digestive system absorbs, thus reducing the amount of harmful substances in the bloodstream. So you can eat whatever you want and harmful substances will not penetrate into your blood; These components facilitate the production of adiponectin, the hormone responsible for burning body fat. Restoring blood cholesterol and sugar levels to normal; Cleanse toxins. I saw everything myself when the results of the medical examination revealed that I was completely healthy. The manufacturer's promise was correct, my blood sugar and cholesterol levels were normal. I ate as much as I wanted and as much as I wanted. I think every ordinary man does that.

Over the course of 3 months of using Green Coffee I managed to lose 45 kg and now I weigh 79 kg.

The medicine is not addictive. I stopped for a long time between doses and continued to feel better. Moreover, the kilograms she lost were no longer again. Now my stable weight is always 79 kg.
